response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $8,000 to you. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to propose an offer of $7,200 for the product. This price not only allows us to maintain a fair profit margin but also ensures you receive a significant discount compared to its market value. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to enhance your experience with our product.", "product_price": 7200}
